item.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Empire City announced for SteamVR, Quest
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/teenage-mutant-ninja-turtles-empire-city-announced-for-steamvr-quest

Publisher Beyond Frames Entertainment and GORN series developer Cortopia Studios have announced virtual reality action adventure game Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Empire City for SteamVR and Quest. It will launch in 2026.

About

A brotherhood in the shadows. A city on the brink.

In the vacuum left by Shredder’s demise, the Foot Clan’s grip tightens on the streets you once called home. It’s time to reclaim what’s yours. Don the mask of Leonardo, Raphael, Donatello, or Michelangelo in the first ever Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles virtual reality game.

Key Features

  • Master each Turtle’s signature weapon with precision strikes and blocks in this first-person action adventure.
  • Scale urban landscapes with fluid parkour
  • Confront fan-favorite villains
  • Forge your own chapter in the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles legacy, solo or play cooperatively with up to three friends.

Family is forever. Find yours in 2026.

Watch the announcement teaser trailer below.

item.title: Elden Ring Nightreign launch trailer
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/elden-ring-nightreign-launch-trailer

Publisher Bandai Namco and developer FromSoftware have released the launch trailer for standalone multiplayer cooperative action RPG survival game Elden Ring Nightreign.

Here is an overview of the game, via Bandai Namco:

About

In Elden Ring Nightreign, players must make split-second decisions about combat and exploration across a map that can fluctuate with different biomes, weapons, and enemies in order to become stronger, and outrun the encroaching circle of fire to be able to take on terrifying bosses at the end of each day. This culminates on the third day, where if players were successful in surviving the night must take on one of the Nightlords—new bosses for this version. Nightfarers must learn to cooperate to take down these challenges, combining their unique abilities together for an unparalleled experience in the Elden Ring universe. All is not lost for those who fall in defeat. Unsuccessful runs will grant players relics to allow them to customize and upgrade their characters tailored to their personal play styles.

Key Features

  • Rise Together – Join forces with other players to take on the creeping night and the dangers within featuring three-player cooperative play.
  • Become a Hero – Take command of uniquely skilled heroes, each possessing their own abilities and distinct flair. While individually powerful, their skills grow even more formidable when united as a team.
  • Take on the Night – Overcome a relentless environmental threat that sweeps through a land that changes between each game session and defeat the magnificent boss of that night!

Elden Ring Nightreign is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and PC via Steam on May 30.

item.title: Gold Gold Adventure Gold launches in Early Access on June 20
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/gold-gold-adventure-gold-launches-in-early-access-on-june-20

  • PC

New demo available June 6.

Colony simulation / reverse RPG Gold Gold Adventure Gold will launch for PC via Steam on June 20, developer Can Can Can a Man announced. A new demo will be available beginning June 6, featuring improvements based on feedback from the game’s May playtest.

Here is an overview of the game, via Can Can Can a Man:

About

In Gold Gold Adventure Gold, you’re not the hero—you’re the one footing the bill. Build a city in a land besieged by monsters. Adventurers show up chasing treasure and glory, and it’s up to you to assign quests to kill, defend, explore, and more. Cross your fingers and hope they make it back alive! While they stumble through danger, you’ll be collecting taxes, upgrading your settlement, and trying not to bankrupt yourself by bribing them to keep going. There’s no problem gold can’t solve—except when you run out of it.

Key Features

  • Give Quests – Everyone knows that adventurers do not work for free. Their loyalty lies with GOLD! You’ll have to recruit them with promises of gold or glory, and give them quests! Kill, defend, explore, and more!
  • Recruit Unique Adventurers – Gold-thirsty adventurers will come from all corners of the world. Humans, beastmen, mothmen, undead, and more may join your cause. Pick them all, or only your favorites!
  • Build a City – Build a thriving city around a monster-filled dungeon. Create an economy based on either farming or monster-slaying, and watch as it evolves based on your actions. Whatever you choose, remember to collect your share of the taxes!
  • Raise a Pet God-Beast – The pet you found snacking on your supplies seems to be growing more than expected. Far more. It might be wise to teach it what is right and wrong, before it grows too big to care about your opinions. Raise it, teach it spells or tricks, pet it, brush it, and if necessary discipline it. You might find that it becomes a trusted companion on your journey!
  • Fight Monsters – As your adventurers clear the world of monsters, you can watch their pathetic struggle against the world. Be merciful and help them survive, get better items, and learn new skills… or feed them to your god-beast. Each level brings them one step closer towards a forbidden evolution.
  • Survive the Night (Survival Mode) – Face waves of chaos in this high-stakes mode where every night brings tougher enemies and harder choices. Build your settlement, spend your coin, and see if your adventurers can survive long enough to see daylight. How many nights can your gold keep them alive?
  • Feed the Greed (Colony Sim Mode) – Take a more relaxed approach in this long-form mode focused on exploration, city growth, and watching your settlement evolve over time. Fewer disasters, more decisions—perfect for players who want to build a beautiful gold-fueled mess at their own pace.

Watch a new trailer below.

item.title: MindsEye ‘Introduction’ trailer, Game Creation Tools and post-launch content detailed
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/mindseye-introduction-trailer-game-creation-tools-and-post-launch-content-detailed

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

A constant stream of new content.

Build A Rocket Boy has released a new trailer and screenshots for single-player action adventure game MindsEye, as well as detailed the title’s Game Creation Tools and planned constant stream of new content.

“We’re beyond excited to bring MindsEye to players worldwide,” said Build A Rocket Boy founder and game director Leslie Benzies in a press release. “Our team has poured passion into creating a game that not only delivers an unforgettable story but also empowers players to shape their own experiences with our Game Creation Tools. With constant updates and new content from our team, MindsEye will be a journey that keeps on giving.”

  • ❮
  • ❯

Here are the details:

Story

Set in the near-futuristic city of Redrock, MindsEye delivers a tightly crafted linear story, where players will step into the shoes of Jacob Diaz, a former soldier haunted by fragmented memories from his mysterious MindsEye neural implant, as he uncovers a conspiracy involving rogue AI, corporate greed, an unchecked military, and a threat so sinister that it endangers the very survival of humanity. The game’s story is brought to life with state-of-the-art visuals built on Unreal Engine 5.

Game Creation Tools

MindsEye introduces an innovative integration with Build A Rocket Boy’s UGC platform, empowering players with deceptively easy-to-use Game Creation Tools. These tools allow players to craft their own content using MindsEye assets, creating everything from custom missions to entirely new scenarios within the game’s richly detailed world. Whether you’re designing a high-speed chase through Redrock’s bustling cityscapes or a stealth mission in its industrial outskirts, the Game Creation UGC Tools are designed to be intuitive and accessible, ensuring that players of all skill levels can bring their ideas to life.

Constant Stream of Fresh Content

Build A Rocket Boy is committed to delivering a constant stream of fresh content through these Game Creation Tools, ensuring that MindsEye remains a living, evolving experience. The development team will regularly release new missions, challenges, and assets. This steady flow of developer-driven content, combined with the community’s own creations, means that MindsEye will continue to surprise and delight players long after launch. MindsEye has a future filled with diverse episodes and interactive experiences that will keep the Build A Rocket Boy universe rapidly expanding for decades to come.

MindsEye is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store on June 10.

Watch the trailer below. View the screenshots at the gallery.

item.title: PlayStation Plus Monthly Games; bonus Game Catalog and Classics Catalog titles for June 2025 announced
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/playstation-plus-monthly-games-bonus-game-catalog-and-classics-catalog-titles-for-june-2025-announced

Sony Interactive Entertainment has announced its Days of Play 2025 promotion, which includes details on the full June 2025 Monthly Games lineup for PlayStation Plus Essential members, as well bonus Game Catalog titles for Extra and Premium members, and Classics Catalog titles for Premium members.

Get the details below.

Monthly Games

Available from June 3 to 30 for all PlayStation Plus members, unless otherwise noted.

  • Alone in the Dark (2024) (PS5)
  • Bomb Rush Cyberfunk (PS5, PS4)
  • Destiny 2: The Final Shape (PS5, PS4) (available May 28)
  • NBA 2K25 (PS5, PS4)

Game Catalog

Available for Premium / Extra members.

  • Another Crab’s Treasure (PS5) (available May 29)
  • Destiny 2: Legacy Collection (PS5, PS4) (available June 4)
  • Grand Theft Auto III: The Definitive Edition (available June 10)
  • Skull and Bones (PS5) (available June 2)

Classics Catalog

Available from June 5 for Premium members.

  • Myst (PS5, PS4)
  • Riven (PS5, PS4)

Game Trials

Available from May 28 for Premium members.

  • Kingdom Come: Deliverance II (PS5)
  • Sid Meier’s Civilization VII (PS5, PS4)

Other Content

PlayStation Tournaments

From June 3 through June 11, participate in special PlayStation Tournaments for NBA 2K25, which is included in our PlayStation Plus Monthly Games lineup for June. Players can compete in multiple competitions each day for a chance to win prizes including NBA 2K Virtual Currency and Days of Play-themed PlayStation Network avatars.

Days of Play 2025 Deals

We’re also celebrating Days of Play with exciting promotions across consoles, games, accessories, and gear from PlayStation Direct (where available), participating retailers (prices may vary), and on PlayStation Store. For more information on your local deals, be sure to check out the Days of Play 2025 website.

Deals Directly from PlayStation and Participating Retailers

From May 28 to June 11 in select regions, save on hardware and accessories including PlayStation 5 consoles, DualSense controllers, and more. You can find these offers on PlayStation Direct (where available), as well as at participating local retailers. Please note that offers and promotion dates may vary by region and retailer.

Deals on PlayStation 5 console offerings include:

  • In the United States and Canada, PlayStation 5 console – Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 Bundle (Digital and Standard) will be available starting at $399.99 USD / $509.99 CAD (Save up to $119.99 USD / $159.99 CAD compared to buying separately).
  • In select regions such as Europe and Asia, PlayStation 5 console (Digital and Standard) will be on promotion, starting at €399.99 / £339.99 / ¥65,980.
  • $50 USD off PlayStation 5 Pro console

There will also be offers for PlayStation 5 accessories and games, including:

  • $50 USD off PlayStation VR2 and PlayStation VR2 Horizon Call of the Mountain Bundle
  • $30 USD off Pulse Explore wireless earbuds
  • $30 USD off DualSense Edge wireless controller
  • $20 USD off Access controller
  • $20 USD off DualSense wireless controller
  • Various discounts on PS5 games including ASTRO BOT, MLB The Show 25, The Last of Us Part II Remastered, and LEGO Horizon Adventures.

On PlayStation Direct, get exclusive offers on products like Shapes of Play, PlayStation 5 console covers, and other PlayStation 5 accessories like external storage drives, and more. When ordering directly from PlayStation, you can also enjoy free standard shipping and free returns on eligible orders.

  • In the U.K., players can upgrade their gaming with Flex to lease a PlayStation 5 Digital Edition console starting at £9.95 per month and PlayStation 5 Pro console starting at £17.99 per month. Learn more here.
  • In Benelux, Portugal, and Spain, all PlayStation Plus members ordering directly from PlayStation can also enjoy an extra five percent discount.

PlayStation Plus Memberships

This Days of Play, save on a new or upgraded PlayStation Plus membership—players who join PlayStation Plus during this year’s celebration can save up to 33 percent on select 12-month memberships.* For players who are currently a PlayStation Plus Essential or Extra member, save 33 percent on the remainder of your membership when upgrading to PlayStation Plus Premium / Deluxe.

Sony Pictures Core

Keep an eye out for sales on PlayStation Productions movies throughout Days of Play on Sony Pictures Core! Additionally, PlayStation Plus members can enjoy 10 percent off movies store-wide on Sony Pictures Core as well as double discounts for limited-time Flash Sales dropping every few days from May 28 through June 11, including super-hero blockbusters and more.

PlayStation Store

Celebrate Days of Play with hundreds of digital games and add-ons on offer at PlayStation Store.
